page.title: 07CONTINUED FROM PAGE 6
page.content:
companies.Most of crops are effected by pigeons.Of these crops 100% are sold outwards.We interviewed a milk man who told us that he sold 70 gallons of milk per week. A farmer we spoke to said that foreign crops are a menace.
{FOXHILLS PLANTATION The square which we were studing has the grid reference 18,37 on the ordanance survey map.One half of the area is known as Atkinson's Warren or Foxhills Plantation. Atkinson's Warren is a rough area which is unsuitable for farming,however a small part of it is used for industy.Over the past five years several buildings have been constructed.These buildings are either used for shops or storage areas.This has introduced jobs for local people
